DOC.brief_summary: This post-market clinical follow-up study intend investigate long-term functionality VEGA System® . The design VEGA System® mean provide patient knee mobility compare pre-operative state.The endpoint revision least one prosthesis component
DOC.brief_title: VEGA System® Study Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Patient 18 75 year old 2 . Patient able comply followup requirement include postoperative selfevaluations . 3 . Patient require primary knee replacement . 4 . Patient diagnosis osteoarthritis 5 . Patient intact collateral ligament . Exclusion Criteria 1 . Vulnerable patient legal protection 2 . Patients inflammatory arthritis . 3 . Patients high tibial osteotomy femoral osteotomy . 4 . Pregnancy
